attributes.action: Speak up in support of our Economy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition the Prime Minster to speak up in support of the economy. If you are sick of the media putting our future down and the lack of any statement from the Prime Minister please sign this petition.

rejection.details: Please specify what area you would like the PM to comment about
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
